attributes.action: stop 100 hour pharmcies from opening and wasting NHS funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are too many chemists all over UK and the government is allowing useless contracts to be given for more chemists to open wasting valuable NHS funds.Most of these 100 hour chemist are a burden and ruin the lives of many individuals who have built their livelihood from their own business. This is immoral and inconsiderate.
